name: The Offline xkcd Reader
tagline: x+k+c+d = 42. Coincidence ? I don't think so.
body:
Want to have a stash of every xkcd comic that has come out so far, so you can read it offline ? 

Well, you've come to the right place.


* Download the repo as a zip file or a tarball. 
* Run the xkcdReader.pyw file to get rolling.


Welcome to the Webcomic of Romance, Sarcasm, Math and Language. The Answer to Life, the Universe and Everything.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
